thread.title: 9to5Rewards: Last Chance to Win a Google Pixel 8 from Formovie (+4K Ultra Short Throw Projector Deal)
thread.title_full: 9to5Rewards: Last Chance to Win a Google Pixel 8 from Formovie (+4K Ultra Short Throw Projector Deal)

author: Tracy Lopez
title: 9to5Rewards: Last Chance to Win a Google Pixel 8 from Formovie (+4K Ultra Short Throw Projector Deal)
text: There's still time to join the giveaway with our friends at Formovie to win Google's new Pixel 8. For a limited time, you can also score up to $800 off the new Formovie Theater, a premium Android TV-powered 4K ultra short throw projector. Head below to take a closer look and enter the giveaway now. Formovie Theater Premium 4K Ultra Short Throw Projector The FormaMovie Theater with Built-In Android TV, which we reviewed earlier this year, gives you the ability to add a 150-inch, high-quality display to your living room. The Theater is a short-throw projector, which means you don't have to mount it on a wall or ceiling. Rather, all you need is a table and a wall (and ideally a screen, too). The projector can display up to 150 inches on the wall with minimal impact on your living room. And with 4K HDR support, everything will look crisp and vibrant, just like it does on a traditional TV. It even supports Dolby Vision, HDR10, and HDR10+ for a great movie theater-like experience. And everything is displayed with super-accurate colors at 107% of the Rec.2020 color gamut standard. Ahead of the holidays, Formuvi is offering $500 off theaters using the Formuvi coupon code best500 When checking out at the Formovie store. You may get an even better deal – and a excess Enhanced Experience – Pairing it with the Formovie 150-inch ALR screen, the bundle is currently discounted by $800. how to enter: For a chance to win a Google Pixel 8, enter your name and email below to sign up for Formovie and 9to5Google's newsletter (one submission per email address). Be sure to share our giveaway on Facebook or Facebook pixel 8 cheap FTC: We use auto affiliate links that generate income. More.
